input.sentences: the class was coming up with ideas on how to decorate the class room .
the teacher went around the table asking the kids .
after deciding | they got to work .
output.sentences: The class was coming up with decoration ideas for their big Cinco de Mayo party.
The tables were stocked with everything the kids would need to make all sorts of crafts.
Everyone had a different opinion on what they should make but that was okay.
There were plenty of supplies to go around so they decided on a few different ideas.
Everyone got to work cutting and and coloring.
